channel.title: Lunch on This is Wei
channel.description: Recent content in Lunch on This is Wei

item.title: Celebration
item.description: Today was a special day! We decided to celebrate it by visiting a bunch of places in NYC. Even though we did not end up going to Two Little Red Hens, I enjoyed it very much! SUGARFISH has been a popular sushi spot in the west coast. I was very glad that SUGARFISH opened its NYC location. We came here for celebrating a special day. I ordered the trust me lite, which included organic edamame, tuna sashimi, albacore sushi (1-pc), salmon sushi (1-pc), Nozawa-style shrimp sushi (1-pc) and toro Hand Roll.

item.title: 2017 Partial Solar Eclipse NYC
item.description: It has been years since the last time that I saw a partial solar eclipse in China. I remembered to look out the window of a 6-floor apartment building in an open area was pretty awesome. Plus, there had no clouds on that day, which was very rare in my hometown. The entire process didn’t last that long but enough for me to enjoy. Today, I was able to see the partial solar eclipse again in NYC.
